channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: HAZMAT PACKAGE CAME IN TO THE PSC WITH WATER DAMAGE. 1 OF 4 GALLONS OF PRODUCT WERE DAMAGED. THE 3 PRISTINE PRODUCTS WILL BE RETURNED VIA SALVAGE DRUM. DAMAGED PRODUCT PRECESSED THROUGH DMP PROCESS.

item.title: Report X-2024120339
item.description:
Report X-2024120339

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-05T12:24:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-09
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO UNLOAD TO DEAL WITH LEAKER. NOTED STRONG SMELL. PACKAGE BROUGHT BACK TO PSC FOR PROCESSING. INSPECTION OF LEAKER AND CHECKING ITS SDS REVEALED IT TO BE A POTENTIAL UNDECLARED HAZMAT. UPS UNDECLARED HAZMAT POLICY INITIATED.
